desc: Maine Coast Sea Vegetables specializes in sustainably harvested seaweeds from the North Atlantic. We sell organic Dulse, Kelp (N. Atlantic Kombu), Alaria (N. Atlantic Wakame), Laver (N. Atlantic Nori), Sea Lettuce, Bladderwrack, Rockweed and Irish Moss. We provide seaweed recipes, nutrition, research, news, and more!

layout.text:
- Orders must be placed by 4pm Monday July 25th
- MCSV will close at 4pm EST, Friday July 29th
- We will reopen Tuesday August 29th
